page.title: 03RAF LYNEHAM
page.content: THE STATION'S FLYING ACTIVITIES, WHICH OPERATE 24 HOURS PER DAY FOR 365 DAYS PER YEAR, ARE SUPPORTED BY AN ENGINEERING, AN OPERATIONS AND AN ADMINISTRATIVE WING. IN ADDITION, THE UNITED KINGDOM MOBILE AIR MOVEMENTS SQUADRON IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL PASSENGER AND FREIGHT HANDLING AT LYNEHAM. THE SQUADRON ALSO PROVIDES MOBILE TEAMS, CAPABLE OF DEPLOYING ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD AT SHORT NOTICE, WHERE THERE IS NO MILITARY PRESENCE CAPABLE OF DEALING WITH AIR MOVEMENTS ACTIVITY. FINALLY, NO 47(AIR DESPATCH) SQUADRON OF THE ROYAL CORPS OF TRANSPORT IS ESTABLISHED AT LYNEHAM TO PREPARE, LOAD, AND DESPATCH ALL STORES THAT ARE TO BE DROPPED BY PARACHUTE FROM THE HERCULES.
